description: This file sets up a knowledge base using document data, initializes a vector database, and performs a query with filtering based on metadata such as user ID and document type. It involves downloading sample documents, configuring a vector database, and executing an agent-based query.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A class representing the LanceDB vector database, used for storing and querying document vectors.

classes.name: DocxKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class for managing a knowledge base built from DOCX documents, including loading documents and metadata.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class that facilitates querying the knowledge base with support for filters and automated knowledge retrieval.

methods.name: download_knowledge_filters_sample_data
methods.description: Downloads sample DOCX files for testing and populates a list with their paths.
